meanings.sent1: She preferred an unostentatious dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: The room was decorated in an unostentatious manner.
meanings.sent3: Even though she won the award, she remained unostentatious about it.
meanings.sent4: His unostentatious lifestyle spoke volumes about his character.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of her unostentatious jewelry was in its simplicity.

meanings.sent1: He lived in an unostentatious house in the suburbs.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her unostentatious way of dressing.
meanings.sent3: Despite his wealth, he chose an unostentatious lifestyle.
meanings.sent4: Her unostentatious behavior endeared her to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unostentatious way he spoke showed his humility.

meanings.sent1: The restaurant had an unostentatious menu with simple dishes.
meanings.sent2: His unostentatious demeanor made him approachable.
meanings.sent3: She appreciated his unostentatious sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: The unostentatious design of the building blended well with the surroundings.
meanings.sent5: In a world of extravagance, her unostentatious nature stood out.
